about me

on the internet, i go by kath [katherine is my second name] or berry [english equivalent of my childhood nickname]

my love of beautiful websites made me curious about how they were made. after lots of research, i discovered web development which led to my interest in frontend development. since then, i've been honing my skills and building projects to apply what i've learned.
